results.title: Effect of metformin on ballooning degeneration in nonalcoholic steatohepatitis (NASH): when to use metformin in nonalcoholic fatty liver disease (NAFLD).
results.text_hl: We specifically reviewed the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Takotsubo_Cardiomyopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054549 @@@HB@@@.

citations.NLM: Doycheva I, Loomba R. Effect of metformin on ballooning degeneration in nonalcoholic steatohepatitis (NASH): when to use metformin in nonalcoholic fatty liver disease (NAFLD). Adv Ther. 2014 Jan;31(1):30-43. PMID: 24385405
citations.BibTeX: @article{24385405, title={Effect of metformin on ballooning degeneration in nonalcoholic steatohepatitis (NASH): when to use metformin in nonalcoholic fatty liver disease (NAFLD).}, author={Doycheva I and Loomba R}, journal={Adv Ther}, volume={31}, number={1}, pages={30-43}}

results.title: Eburicoic Acid, a Triterpenoid Compound from Antrodia camphorata, Displays Antidiabetic and Antihyperlipidemic Effects in Palmitate-Treated C2C12 Myotubes and in High-Fat Diet-Fed Mice
results.text_hl: Here, we conduct the model of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@ in this study by comparing the clinic anti @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ golden drug, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (Meft), and the hypolipidemic drug, @CHEMICAL_Fenofibrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011345 @@@fenofibrate@@@ (Feno).

citations.NLM: Lin CH, Kuo YH, Shih CC. Eburicoic Acid, a Triterpenoid Compound from Antrodia camphorata, Displays Antidiabetic and Antihyperlipidemic Effects in Palmitate-Treated C2C12 Myotubes and in High-Fat Diet-Fed Mice Int J Mol Sci. 2017 Nov 2;18(11):. PMID: 29099085
